fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance professionalism with readability, utilizing web-safe fonts for a clean and accessible design.
fontTheory.readability: The combination of Georgia for body text ensures comfortable reading, while Arial for headings provides clarity and hierarchy.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Distinct font families and sizes create a clear typographic hierarchy, guiding the reader through the document.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The pairing of Arial and Georgia offers a traditional yet modern feel, complemented by monospace Courier New for technical content.
